DOC.brief_summary: No study report effect pre-meal snacking raisin compare commonly consume snack energy intake child . Therefore , objective current study examine appetite energy intake follow consumption ad libitum snack raisin , grape mix almond raisin , compare water control , appetite food intake 30 min later 8 - 11 old normal weight child . The investigator hypothesize raisin would lower subsequent energy intake child reduce hunger .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Ad Libitum Pre-Meal Raisin Snack Satiety Food Intake Children
DOC.criteria: healthy boy girl 811 Exclusion criterion : learn behavioral problem
DOC.keyword: raisin , grape , snack , appetite , food intake
